com.groundupworks.wings.core

Class WingsDbHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.groundupworks.wings.core.WingsDbHelper

  • public class WingsDbHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    The Wings database helper that stores ShareRequest records and manages the state of those records.

      • createShareRequest

        public boolean createShareRequest(java.lang.String filePath,
                         Destination destination)
        Creates a new ShareRequest.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the local path to the file to share.
        destination - the destination of the share.
        Returns:
        true if successful; false otherwise.

      • checkoutShareRequests

        public java.util.List<ShareRequest> checkoutShareRequests(Destination destination)
        Checks out a list of ShareRequest that need to be processed, filtered by destination. The list is sorted by time of creation, from the earliest to most recent. This method internally changes the checked out records to a processing state, so a call to markSuccessful(int) or markFailed(int) is expected to be called on each of those records.
        Parameters:
        destination - the destination of the ShareRequest to checkout.
        Returns:
        the list of ShareRequest; may be empty.

      • deleteShareRequests

        public void deleteShareRequests(Destination destination)
        Deletes all ShareRequest based on destination.
        Parameters:
        destination - the destination of the list of ShareRequest to delete.

      • markSuccessful

        public boolean markSuccessful(int id)
        Marks a ShareRequest as successfully processed.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the ShareRequest.
        Returns:
        true if successful; false otherwise.

      • markFailed

        public boolean markFailed(int id)
        Marks a ShareRequest as failed to process.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the ShareRequest.
        Returns:
        true if successful; false otherwise.

      • purge

        public int purge()
        Purges the database based on the purge policy.
        Returns:
        the number of records remaining after the purge; or -1 if an error occurred.

      • resetProcessingShareRequests

        public void resetProcessingShareRequests()
        Reset all records that somehow got stuck in a processing state.
